content: Is there something like a changelog/whats new for cranelift? Or something like Cranelift weekly one could track?
Usecase: I'm tracking cranelift progress but the git history is a bit too verbose and hard to read\

We don't have a newsletter but that's an interesting idea. Within Cranelift itself, things are mostly progressing along with SIMD support (Andrew Brown, Johnnie Birch, Anton Kirilov, Sean Parker), regalloc2 (me, review by Julian Seward), improved fuzzing (Andrew Brown, Afonso Bordado), drafting some new isel framework / an RFC describing it (me), s390x stuff (Ulrich Weigand), and maybe something else I've missed
